title: Global Chronicle: where news finds its voice
description: A website for getting free realtime news of all categories
feature1: Interactive Home Page: Engage users with a visually appealing and interactive home page.
feature2: User Authentication Page: Implement Login and SignUp page for personalized experiences.
feature3: News API Integration: Seamlessly integrate News API for up-to-date News data.
feature4: Diverse Categories including Science,Health, Technology, Sports, War, Politics, Entertainer  etc .
feature5: Responsive Design for a consistent and enjoyable user experience across various devices.
